abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column describes challenges faced by gymnast Gabby Douglas since winning gold medal in all-around at 2012 Olympics; suggests difficulty of managing her newfound fame contributed to poor showing in trials that almost left her off current team bound for 2016 Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Douglas will attend a pre-Olympics training camp as she attempts to refocus her career in order to defend her all-around title at the Rio Games.

headline.main: Gabby Douglas Seeks to Rebound From Her Olympic Stardom
headline.print_headline: A Champion Seeks to Rebound From Her Olympic Stardom

snippet: Douglas will attend a pre-Olympics training camp as she attempts to refocus her career in order to defend her all-around title at the Rio Games....
